item.title: phoveus
item.description: × PHOVEUS HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ PHOVEUS MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Fighter Lane: EXP Lane Tier : S Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : 0 phoveus × @ Close More Info Hero skills Phoveus Skills 1 × Demonic Intuition Phoveus' weapon, (Astaros), holds mysterious powers and is exceptionally sensitive to fast-moving prey. When an enemy hero uses Blink or Charge skills within 8 yards of Astaros, it reduces all of Phoveus' skill cooldowns or charge times by 1s.
